roleset.name: brave, forward,
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6, relation to embolden.01.

example.name: both args
example.text: May I be so bold to suggest the Songyuan Municipal Soft Environment Office conduct an in - depth investigation on the case of " approval on the use of land with the fabricated official stamp , " and thoroughly dig out and break up the power - protective umbrella for illegal developers with the " fabricated official stamp " ?
example.arg: to suggest the Songyuan Municipal Soft Environment Office conduct an in - depth investigation on the case of " approval on the use of land with the fabricated official stamp , " and thoroughly dig out and break up the power - protective umbrella for illegal developers with the " fabricated official stamp

roleset.name: darkened, thickened type

example.name: arg1
example.text: The type was bold and approximately 68pts in height.
